2_1LJLVfT9hKRuTHzBKTpse57PGfpwx82myR.body:
> [cannonfodder](#comment_29_1GCMDNMgJHvZJfdbD9ygDmpBdnVAobdJYg): I wget/curl large files over tor all the time. It works fine.

i would reccomend aria2c if using wget/curl tbh -- https://aria2.github.io/, which you can have webui (https://github.com/ziahamza/webui-aria2). aria2c also handles .torrent and magnet links so no need for a torrent client.
